import { useTheme } from "../../Context/Theme" import Button from "../Generic/Button" import Multislider from "../Generic/Multislider" import Paper from "../Generic/Paper" import Dropdown from "./Dropdown" import { useUser } from "../../Context/User" import Typography from "../Generic/Typography" const Filters = () => { const user = useUser() const theme = useTheme() const { removeFavorite } = user return (
{user.user.favorites.map((favorite, index) => ( <>
{favorite.title} {favorite.tagline.length > 100 ? `${favorite.tagline.substring(0, 100)}...` : favorite.tagline}
{(user.user.favorites.length > 1 && index !== user.user.favorites.length - 1) &&
} ))}
) } export default Filters
